ivermectin-can-kill-covid-19-within-48-h.story_title: Ivermectin can kill COVID-19 within 48 hours', Monash University study finds
ivermectin-can-kill-covid-19-within-48-h.summary: A drug called Ivermectin could potentially be used to treat COVID-19 within 48 hours. As it is already an approved drug this is very important as the vaccine could take a while to be widely available.
ivermectin-can-kill-covid-19-within-48-h.what: an anti-parastic drug that alredy exists in the world called ivermectin that could be used to treat COVID-19
ivermectin-can-kill-covid-19-within-48-h.why: Because it is a possible cure for corona virus

challenges-expected-for-novavax-covid-19.story_title: Challenges expected for Novavax' COVID-19 vaccine in USA
challenges-expected-for-novavax-covid-19.summary: In Mexico, the supplies are decreasing. Operation warp speed - distributing millions of vaccines to other countries
challenges-expected-for-novavax-covid-19.what: supplies in Mexico are decreasing, Alpha and Beta strains
challenges-expected-for-novavax-covid-19.why: highlights the potential challenges expected to come from the Novavax vaccine

australian-gps-urged-to-prescribe-iverme.story_title: Australian GPs urged to prescribe ivermectin triple therapy to fight COVID-19
australian-gps-urged-to-prescribe-iverme.summary: Australian GPs have discovered that using Ivermectin in the fight against Covid-19 could be the fastest and most effective way to treat it, however it is proving difficult to get AUstralian GPs on their side.
australian-gps-urged-to-prescribe-iverme.what: how Invermectin could be the fastest and safest way to cure corona virus
australian-gps-urged-to-prescribe-iverme.why: Because there is a possible cure for corona-virus that the governmnet wont  using and instead waiting for the vaccine

japan-is-first-country-to-approve-covid-.story_title: Japan is first country to approve COVID-19 cocktail Ronapreve
japan-is-first-country-to-approve-covid-.summary: The ronapreve cocktail reduced patients symptoms as well as reducing the risk of hospitalization and death
japan-is-first-country-to-approve-covid-.why: Because the Ronapreve cocktail reduces the risks of hospitalization and death

pfizer.summary: Whilst the vaccines are so important because they have managed to save so many lives and make so many more people feel comfortable in this uncertain world. It is important that we look at it not only on a moral level but also from the less encouraging perspective of the capitalist gain that is being seen through the production of vaccines. Not only are the vaccines being distributed in greater density to european and western countries who most likely already have more resources to deal with COVID patients that developing countries may, but also the wealth that the vaccine companies are accumulating from the sales of their vaccines are not being put to the greater humanitarian use such as being used to ' vaccinate 1.3 billion people.'

astrazeneca.summary: whilst many people have taken advantage of the vaccine and recieved it, there are still many people who are sceptical about it, both in terms of what its long/short term side effects may be, and also about the actual effectiveness of it due to people who are vaccinated still being able to contract COVID-19. These fears are backed up by news articles such as some of those above that we see appearing every now and then regarding the effects of the vaccine, such as blood clots. These news articles alongside word of mouth stories about feeling sick for many days after the vaccine all inevitably will have a knock on effect on the uptake of vaccines and may impact some peoples decisions to go ahead and have the vaccine, their lack of which could then effect peoples lives.
